name: Paleo Artichoke Bruschetta
author: Cindy Anschutz Barbieri
summary: Bruschetta is an antipasto from Italy consisting of grilled bread rubbed with garlic and topped with tomatoes, olive oil, salt, and pepper. I have many bruschetta recipes but due to my love of artichokes this one had to be shared! Serve with your favorite grilled vegetables or sliced cucumbers. Enjoy.
ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) can artichoke hearts, drained and chopped
½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper
½  red bell pepper, finely chopped
directions: Mix artichoke hearts, garlic, sea salt, and black pepper together in a large bowl; add red bell pepper, olive oil, basil, and onion and stir well
